name: Beeg Video Downloader
tagline: Save Beeg videos instantly for offline viewing.
description:
Beeg Video Downloader automates the HLS-to-MP4 conversion that keeps most Beeg videos locked to streaming. It detects the player as soon as it loads, captures the hidden playlists, and gives you a clean list of quality options so you can archive clips in the resolution you prefer.

A guided popup displays bitrate, estimated file size, and stream type before you download. Once you start, an inline progress manager tracks segment speed, percentage, and ETA while background workers stitch the MP4 together with retries whenever a chunk fails.

The extension keeps everything localâ€”licence details, quality presets, and downloaded files never leave your browser. Desktop notifications and a right-click shortcut make saving multiple videos at once as simple as queuing them and returning when the alerts fire.

Activation requires a one-time licence and it is worth letting each tab stay open until processing completes. HLS conversion takes a little CPU time, but you get lossless MP4 copies without juggling developer tools or command-line scripts.

faqs.question: How do I download a Beeg video with this extension?
faqs.answer: Activate your licence, open a Beeg video, let the player finish loading, then click the inline download button or toolbar icon. Choose the resolution you want and keep the tab open while the progress panel shows segment and merge status.

faqs.question: Can it download multiple videos at once?
faqs.answer: Yes. Start another download from a different tab or window and each job runs in parallel. You will get a notification when every MP4 is ready.

faqs.question: Does it support subtitles or playlists?
faqs.answer: The extension focuses on video streams. If captions are embedded in the video they will be preserved, but it does not fetch separate subtitle files or auto-queue entire playlists.

faqs.question: Why does the downloader need scripting and offscreen permissions?
faqs.answer: Scripting inspects the video player to list quality options, while the offscreen context converts HLS segments to MP4 without tying up the tab you are browsing in.

faqs.question: Is there a free version or refund policy?
faqs.answer: There is no free tier. A one-time $9 licence unlocks the extension and includes future Beeg compatibility updates, but sales are final.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Beeg Video Downloader ships for Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Mozilla Firefox, Brave, and Opera on Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops.

permission_justifications.justification:
Streams the finished MP4 into your downloads folder and keeps progress indicators
in sync for each active job.

Stores licence activation, preferred quality settings, and retry preferences
locally so the extension is ready every time you open Chrome.

Detects when a Beeg video player is in view and injects the download overlay
on the exact tab you are using.

Allows downloads to keep running if you switch tabs and lets the extension restore
the progress panel when you return.

Enumerates HLS manifests, builds the quality list, and triggers downloads directly
from the page without manual URL copying.

Sends desktop alerts when downloads finish or if a retry needs action so you
can multitask without losing track.

Adds a Download with Beeg Video Downloader entry to the right-click menu for
instant captures.

Handles merging HLS chunks into MP4 files in the background so your main tab
stays responsive.

Limits privileged access to beeg.com and its CDNs, ensuring the extension only
activates on supported domains.
